retina1

grid8

mask_generator = SAM2AutomaticMaskGenerator(
    model=sam2,
    points_per_side=128,
    points_per_batch=32,
    pred_iou_thresh=0.7,
    stability_score_thresh=0.92,
    stability_score_offset=0.7,
    crop_n_layers=4,
    box_nms_thresh=0.7,
    crop_n_points_downscale_factor=2,
    min_mask_region_area=5.0,
    use_m2m=True,
)
